purpose: Enable users to create and manage AI-driven agents and workflows without coding, leveraging LLMs for automation and data interaction
principle: Utilizes a no-code interface to orchestrate LLM-based agents and workflows, allowing users to build applications by integrating data sources and AI capabilities
reusability: Highly composable with support for custom workflows and data integrations; provides an extensible framework for building and managing LLM-driven applications
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential instability; requires understanding of LLM capabilities for effective use
name: LLMStack
description: No-code multi-agent framework to build LLM Agents, workflows and applications with your data
highlight: No-code framework for building multi-agent systems and workflows with large language models (LLMs)
